title: Create an FAQ Document
description: After a project, an agent must create an FAQ document for the client's employees about the new system that was implemented.

tasks.description: Review project documents and training materials to identify common questions and potential areas of confusion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of likely questions.

tasks.description: For each question, draft a clear and concise answer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes helpful and accurate answers.

tasks.description: Format the content into a structured Q&A document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a well-organized FAQ document.
